title: CDSE Tiled Data Access
description: This notebook shows how to access data from CDSE programatically, converting it to a possible wanted format (such as Cloud Optimized Geotiff - COG) and lastly registers it into an eoAPI instance.

metadata.description: This notebook shows how to access data from CDSE programatically, converting it to a possible wanted format (such as Cloud Optimized Geotiff - COG) and lastly registers it into an eoAPI instance.
metadata.title: CDSE Tiled Data Access

title: CDSE Basic Data Access
description: This notebook demonstrates the simplest way to authenticate with the Copernicus Data Space Ecosystem (CDSE), download a Sentinel-2 image, and render it.

metadata.description: This notebook demonstrates the simplest way to authenticate with the Copernicus Data Space Ecosystem (CDSE), download a Sentinel-2 image, and render it.
metadata.title: CDSE Basic Data Access

title: Scale your processes with Dask
description: This notebook demonstrates how to use Dask to process Sentinel-2 satellite data to create burn severity maps for wildfire assessment.

metadata.title: Scale your processes with Dask
metadata.description: This notebook demonstrates how to use Dask to process Sentinel-2 satellite data to create burn severity maps for wildfire assessment.

title: eoAPI registration example
description: This notebook demonstrates how to register data on the workspace eoAPI instance. The main step is creation of STAC metadata information to pass it to the eoAPI STAC endpoint.

metadata.description: This notebook demonstrates how to register data on the workspace eoAPI instance. The main step is creation of STAC metadata information to pass it to the eoAPI STAC endpoint.
metadata.title: eoAPI registration example
